title: The 10 Best Places to Visit in the USA
content: The United States of America is a large country in North America, often referred to as the 'USA', the 'US', the 'United States', 'America', or simply 'the States'.
author: John Doe

title: Japan
content: Japan is a country in East Asia. It is often called the 'Land of the Rising Sun'.
author: Kate

title: City of London
content: The City of London is the 32nd most populous city in the world and the 81st most populous urban area in the world.
author: Jan
